entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning early this morning then changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then to 70 gusting to 100 early this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
